host.description: Host and port for MongoDB, may also be provided with MONGODB_HOST environment variable

password.description: Password for MongoDB connection, may also be provided with MONGODB_PASSWORD environment variable

username.description: Username for MongoDB connection, may also be provided with MONGODB_USERNAME environment variable

db.description: DB Where the user is registered

last_updated.description: Timestamp of the last Terraform update of the order.

password.description: Password of user, cannot be changed once set

roles.description: Set of roles that the user has
